Aries: 1st House in Aries — Bold AF. You walk into a room like you own it.
Taurus: 1st House in Taurus — Sensual vibes. You move slow and steady, dressed like cashmere.
Gemini: 1st House in Gemini — Witty, curious, expressive. You change styles like outfits.
Cancer: 1st House in Cancer — Soft, emotional, protective. You wear your heart on your sleeve.
Leo: 1st House in Leo — Center stage aura. Big hair, big presence, main character energy.
Virgo: 1st House in Virgo — Clean, crisp, composed. Detail in every part of your look.
Libra: 1st House in Libra — Aesthetic perfection. Your face is harmony.
Scorpio: 1st House in Scorpio — Intense eyes. Magnetic mystery. You're an enigma.
Sagittarius: 1st House in Sagittarius — Free-spirited. You look like you're always ready to travel.
Capricorn: 1st House in Capricorn — Classic, mature, powerful. You dress for the top.
Aquarius: 1st House in Aquarius — Unique style. You're from the future.
Pisces: 1st House in Pisces — Ethereal aura. Soft, dreamy, poetic presence.
